sage: E2

....: assert(prime_subgroup_order.is_prime())

sage: hash = E(11908969602713155885792325199223824932796251344693060287446736124160386244105, 8125181524298305558264259494737771912156876635202174315322828679439024167561) # obtained from contract
....: 
sage: sig_list = [sk*hash for sk in sk_list]
sage: agg_sig = sum(sig_list)
....: 
sage: print(agg_sig)
....:
